recipesJson.name: Scrawny Punishments a lemon tart remix
recipesJson.author: moonshot
recipesJson.description: Well this is kinda frustrating the sa lemon cream is chemnovatic lemon cream wafer, this is a crucial part of the recipe, the Fe lemon is chemnovatic Lemon And the fa cookie is chemnovatic cookie must use chemnovatic for those three to be this recipe then I added some fa meringue Which is in the original Juice And some super sweet to rival original sweetness of dinner lady lemon tart pretty darn identical to the original commercial juice just gotta tweak some %’s and should b perfect thanks for mixing enjoy
